Introduction

Seok Matthew is a Canadian singer originally under MNH Entertainment. In 2023, he joined the survival show "Boys Planet," where he ranked 3rd place, earning his spot in the boy group ZEROBASEONE.

He made his official debut with ZEROBASEONE on July 10, 2023, under the management of WAKEONE.
